ModMetaData.name: RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.10[/h1]
This mod changes [b]Vanilla[/b] and [b]Modded[/b] trait colors according to their commonality using the RimTraits coloring scheme.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Vanilla trait coloring [*]Modded trait coloring (4 mods) [/list]
[b]Supported Mods:[/b] [list] [*]RimTraits - General Traits [*]Vanilla Traits Expanded [*]Vanilla Fishing Expanded [*]Medieval Overhaul [*]Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional) [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] - [i]De facto mod for Medieval games.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2646321064]Medieval Empire Overhaul[/url] - [i]Requires Medieval Overhaul. Changes Empire faction from Spacer to Medieval.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2836791007]RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition[/url] - [i]Core mod for RimFantasy. Adds various gem-based magical furniture and weapons. Requires Medieval Overhaul.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2903293603]RimFantasy - House Doyle[/url] - [i]Official RimFantasy AddOn. Adds player craftable house armor plus a new line of Arcane Weapons.[/i]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talents[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2897850163]DLC Mechanics Patch[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2695164414]Tweaks Galore[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508850027]RimHUD[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1855885448]Guard For Me[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*][Minor Conflict] Conflicts with mods that changes trait color based on commonality. [/list]
[url=https://ko-fi.com/sierra0001][img]https://i.imgur.com/SBiUpbW.png[/img][/url]
[b]Balance:[/b] Balance is not particularly relevant in this mod, as commonality is unaltered or dependent on mod usage.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]Ogliss for helping me figure out how patching works. [*]Gouda quiche for helping me figure out how patching works. [*]Mascot inspired and based on Geneforge by Spiderweb Software (Go play the series, it's great). [/list]
